page.title: 12CHURCHES
page.content: 1 Middleton Cheney Parish Church. This has been the parish church for centuries.It's tall spire is the main landmark in the village of Middleton.The average congregation on a Sunday is about 65.The vicar is Rev. Moreton. 2 Baptist Church. This church was established about 300 years ago.The average morning congregation is about 70,and there are many meetings during the week. Mr Stoker,a local teacher,has been minister for 2 years. 3 Methodist Church. A large red-brick church in the village,it was established in 1867. The minister of this,and eight other churches is Barbera Holstead. The average congregation is between 40 and 50.
